name: nudeadmin
description: Administrative dashboard for NudeForge / NudeFlow platform (moderation, settings, media management).

scripts.test: powershell -Command "$env:NODE_ENV='test'; node --experimental-vm-modules test/adminRoutes.test.mjs; node --experimental-vm-modules test/authAdminFlow.test.mjs; node --experimental-vm-modules test/adminUsersMedia.test.mjs; node --experimental-vm-modules test/adminMediaActions.test.mjs; node --experimental-vm-modules test/adminThumbs.test.mjs"
